member.name: T:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.CultureSwitcher
member.summary: Switches the current culture to a specific culture then return to the original culture and dispose. Since Localizer.WithCultre has became obsolete, this is a solution to retrive a string from specific culture resource file

member.name: T:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions
member.summary:
Add localization support for dot net core web apps with one simple step.
download necessary resource files from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.AddExpressLocalization``1(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Action{LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions})
member.summary:
Add all below localization settings with one step;
define supported cultures adn default culture
Add global route template for culture parameter e.g.: http://localhost:1234/{culture}/xxx
Add route value request culture provider
Add view localization using shared resource
Add DataAnnotations localization
Add ModelBinding localization
Add IdentityError localization
Related resource files can be downloaded from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources
member.typeparam: Type of localization resource, this resource should contain all localization messages for Identity, ModelBinding, DataAnnotations localized validiation messages and view localizations as well.
member.param: ExpressLocalizationOptions such as supported cultures and default culture

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.AddExpressLocalization``2(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Action{LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions})
member.summary:
Add all below localization settings with one step;
define supported cultures adn default culture
Add global route template for culture parameter e.g.: http://localhost:1234/{culture}/xxx
Add route value request culture provider
Add view localization using shared resource
Add DataAnnotations localization
Add ModelBinding localization
Add IdentityError localization
Related resource files can be downloaded from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources
member.typeparam: Type of ExpressLocalizationResource, this resource should contain Identity, ModelBinding and DataAnnotations localized validiation messages.
Type of ViewLocalizationResource, this resource is a shared view localization resource.
member.param: ExpressLocalizationOptions such as supported cultures and default culture

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.AddExpressLocalization``4(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Action{LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions})
member.summary:
Add all below localization settings with one step;
define supported cultures adn default culture
Add global route template for culture parameter e.g.: http://localhost:1234/{culture}/xxx
Add route value request culture provider
Add view localization using shared resource
Add DataAnnotations localization
Add ModelBinding localization
Add IdentityError localization
Related resource files can be downloaded from: https://github.com/LazZiya/ExpressLocalization.Resources
member.typeparam: Type of localization resource for Identity error messages.
Type of localization resource for model binding error messages.
Type of localization resource for data annotations.
Type of localization shared resource for razor views.
member.param: ExpressLocalizationOptions such as supported cultures and default culture

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.ExAddDataAnnotationsLocalization``1(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Add DataAnnotatons localization to the project.

member.typeparam: Type of DataAnnotations localization resource
member.param: Express validiation attributes provides already localized eror messages

member.summary:
Add ModelBinding localization to the project.

member.summary:
Add shared locaization settings for views

member.summary:
Add IdentityErrors localization to the project

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.ExAddRouteValueRequestCultureProvider(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Globalization.CultureInfo},System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Add RouteValueRequestCultureProvider, so localization will be based on route value {culture}
member.param: List of supported cultures
default culture name
true to register all culture providers (Route, QueryString, Cookie, AcceptedLanguageHeader), false to use only Route culture provider.

member.name: M:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationExtensions.ExConfigureApplicationCookie(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IMvcBuilder,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Configure application cookie and add culture value to redirect path so unauthorized users will be redirected to login page and the culture will not be lost
member.param: Login path
Logout path
Access denied path
default culture name to add to the path when redirect to login

member.name: T:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions
member.summary: Express localization options

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.RequestLocalizationOptions
member.summary: Specific options for the MÄ°crosoft.AspNetCore.Localizarion.RequestLocalizatonMiddleware

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.UseAllCultureProviders
member.summary:
Optional, default value true.
true to register all culture providers (Route, QueryString, Cookie, AcceptLanguageHeader)
false to use only Route culture provider.

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.ResourcesPath
member.summary: The path to the resources folder e.g. "LocalizationResources"

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.ConfigureRedirectPaths
member.summary:
Optional : Add culture parameter to login, logout and access denied paths.
default value = true
set to false if you need to configure the application cookie options manually

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.DefaultCultureName
member.summary: The default culture to set during redirection to login event if no culture was set.

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.LoginPath
member.summary:
The default login path
default value = "/Identity/Account/Login/"

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.LogoutPath
member.summary:
The default logout path
default value = "/Identity/Account/Logout/"

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.AccessDeniedPath
member.summary:
The default access denied path
default value = "/Identity/Account/AccessDenied/"

member.name: P:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.ExpressLocalizationOptions.UseExpressValidationAttributes
member.summary: Express valdiation attributes provides already localized error messages. Set to true by default. Set to false if you don't want to use express validation attributes.

member.name: T:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages
member.summary:
Call these fields directly from inside valdiation attibute tag, e.g.:
[Required(ErrorMessage = DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.RequiredAttribute_ValidationError)]
Original messages obtained from: https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.ComponentModel.Annotations/src/Resources/Strings.resx

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.ArgumentIsNullOrWhitespace
member.summary: The argument '{0}' cannot be null, empty or contain only whitespace.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.AssociatedMetadataTypeTypeDescriptor_MetadataTypeContainsUnknownProperties
member.summary: The associated metadata type for type '{0}' contains the following unknown properties or fields: {1}. Please make sure that the names of these members match the names of the properties on the main type.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.AttributeStore_Unknown_Property
member.summary: The type '{0}' does not contain a public property named '{1}'.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.Common_PropertyNotFound
member.summary: The property {0}.{1} could not be found.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CompareAttribute_MustMatch
member.summary: '{0}' and '{1}' do not match.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CompareAttribute_UnknownProperty
member.summary: Could not find a property named {0}.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CreditCardAttribute_Invalid
member.summary: The {0} field is not a valid credit card number.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CustomValidationAttribute_Method_Must_Return_ValidationResult
member.summary: The CustomValidationAttribute method '{0}' in type '{1}' must return System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult. Use System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.ValidationResult.Success to represent success.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CustomValidationAttribute_Method_Not_Found
member.summary: The CustomValidationAttribute method '{0}' does not exist in type '{1}' or is not public and static.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CustomValidationAttribute_Method_Required
member.summary: The CustomValidationAttribute.Method was not specified.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CustomValidationAttribute_Method_Signature
member.summary: The CustomValidationAttribute method '{0}' in type '{1}' must match the expected signature: public static ValidationResult {0}(object value, ValidationContext context). The value can be strongly typed. The ValidationContext parameter is optional.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CustomValidationAttribute_Type_Conversion_Failed
member.summary: Could not convert the value of type '{0}' to '{1}' as expected by method {2}.{3}.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CustomValidationAttribute_Type_Must_Be_Public
member.summary: The custom validation type '{0}' must be public.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CustomValidationAttribute_ValidationError
member.summary: {0} is not valid.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.CustomValidationAttribute_ValidatorType_Required
member.summary: The CustomValidationAttribute.ValidatorType was not specified.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.DataTypeAttribute_EmptyDataTypeString
member.summary: The custom DataType string cannot be null or empty.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.DisplayAttribute_PropertyNotSet
member.summary: The {0} property has not been set. Use the {1} method to get the value.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.EmailAddressAttribute_Invalid
member.summary: The {0} field is not a valid e-mail address.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.EnumDataTypeAttribute_TypeCannotBeNull
member.summary: The type provided for EnumDataTypeAttribute cannot be null.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.EnumDataTypeAttribute_TypeNeedsToBeAnEnum
member.summary: The type '{0}' needs to represent an enumeration type.

member.summary: The {0} field only accepts files with the following extensions: {1}

member.summary: The field of type {0} must be a string, array or ICollection type.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.LocalizableString_LocalizationFailed
member.summary: Cannot retrieve property '{0}' because localization failed. Type '{1}' is not public or does not contain a public static string property with the name '{2}'.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.MaxLengthAttribute_InvalidMaxLength
member.summary: MaxLengthAttribute must have a Length value that is greater than zero. Use MaxLength() without parameters to indicate that the string or array can have the maximum allowable length.

member.name: F:LazZiya.ExpressLocalization.Messages.DataAnnotationsErrorMessages.MaxLengthAttribute_ValidationError
member.summary: The field {0} must be a string or array type with a maximum length of '{1}'.

member.summary: MetadataClassType cannot be null.

member.summary: The field {0} must be a string or array type with a minimum length of '{1}'.
